name: Lords of the Sky
description:
In this game you are a pilot of P-38 aircraft. Try to destroy as many enemy aircrafts as you can as fast as you can and become the Lord of the Sky.

Hello!

This game is still in development and i would be very glad if you would write me some ideas about this game:

-what to add,

-what to modify,

-what to improve.

Send e-mails to lwowska.chalwa@outlook.com
